Package gobblin.metrics.reporter.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SchemaVersionWriter
    Writes schema information to an DataOutputStream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroBinarySerializer<T extends SpecificRecord>
    AvroSerializer that serializes into binary.
    AvroJsonSerializer<T extends SpecificRecord>
    AvroSerializer that serializes into JSON.
    AvroSerializer<T extends SpecificRecord>
    Class used for serializing Avro SpecificRecord for metrics reporting.
    EventUtils
    Utilities for MetricReport.
    FixedSchemaVersionWriter
    Write a fixed integer (FixedSchemaVersionWriter.SCHEMA_VERSION) as schema version into the DataOutputStream.
    MetricReportUtils
    Utilities for MetricReport.
    NoopSchemaVersionWriter
    Implementation of SchemaVersionWriter that does not write anything to DataOutputStream.
    SchemaRegistryVersionWriter
    Implementation of SchemaVersionWriter that uses a KafkaAvroSchemaRegistry to get Schema version identifier and write it to DataOutputStream.
